description: Each scenario's Steps start with Given for scenario-specific setup. Background is auto-applied first. Scenario Steps contain setup for THIS scenario only. Example: Background has common setup; Scenario Given has test-specific paths/data.

do.description: Scenario-specific setup in Steps, common setup in Background. Example: Background: Given Agent initialized; Steps: Given test project at specific/path

guidance.description: Scenario Steps start with scenario-specific Given setup
example: Given test project area is set up at test_data/projects/valid-project
And valid base agent.json exists at test_data/agents/base/agent.json

guidance.description: Variable-dependent setup goes in scenario Steps, not Background

dont.description: Don't put common setup in scenario Steps or repeat Background. Example: Repeating 'Given Agent initialized' in Steps (wrong - already in Background)

guidance.description: Don't repeat Background steps in scenario Steps
example: Given Agent is initialized (WRONG if already in Background)

guidance.description: Don't put scenario-specific setup in Background
example: Background: Given test project at test_data/projects/valid-project (WRONG - scenario-specific)
